definitions: (of an animal's back) having an upward curve

examples.text: the dogs sprang forward with their backs roached

definitions: (of a person's hair) brushed upward or forward into a roll

examples.text: he had hair roached down to cover his baldness

shortDefinitions: (of person's hair) brushed upwards or forwards into roll

definitions: (of a horse's mane) clipped or trimmed short so that the hair stands on end

examples.text: a big horse with a roached mane

shortDefinitions: (of horse's mane) clipped or trimmed short so that hair stands on end
